text:
The flag of Fiji was created in October 1970.The history of Fiij dates back to ancient times.There are many theories of how the Fijian race came into existence.Around 1500 BCFiji was settled by melaneasion sea farers.According to native oral legends Fijians were also descendants of a nomadic tribe from TANZANIA
Appearance.
It has a light Blue Ensign with the coat of arms centered on the outer half of the light blue field.
